titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 9,10-Anthracenedione, 1,1'-Y(6-phenyl-1,3,5- triazine-2,4-diyl)diimino?bisY3-acetyl-4-amino-.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/20/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 9,10-Anthracenedione, 1,1'-Y(6-phenyl-1,3,5- triazine-2,4-diyl)diimino?bisY3-acetyl-4-amino-.
